Event: Classes begin.
Labor Day recess. The campus will be closed for Labor Day recess and will reopen on Tuesday, September 3.
Last waitlist run.

Last day to drop and receive a 100% refund. Last day to add classes online. Modular, mid-semester, and educational outreach classes have different registration dates. Check your MyUNLV Student Center for specific deadlines for each class.
Last day to pay in person without late penalties.
Last day to pay online without late penalties.
Late payment fees apply.
Last day to pay in person and online with late fees prior to administrative drop for non-payment.
Administrative drop for non-payment.
Last day to add classes with department permission. Departments and colleges may have shorter time frames for late registration in classes.

Last day for undergraduates to apply for December 2024 degree conferral and be included in the Commencement Program booklet. Late undergraduate applicants, please check with the Registrar’s Office. Graduate students should check with the Graduate College for deadlines.
Last day to completely withdraw from all classes and receive a 50% refund if your account is paid in full.
Nevada Day recess. The campus will be closed for Nevada Day recess and will reopen on Monday, October 28.

Last day to drop classes without a refund/change from credit to audit. No withdrawals or audits after this date. Modular, mid-semester, and educational outreach classes have different withdrawal dates. Check your myUNLV student center for specific deadlines for each class.
Spring registration begins.
Veterans Day recess. The campus will be closed for Veterans Day recess and will reopen on Tuesday, November 12.
Thanksgiving Day recess. The campus will be closed for Thanksgiving Day recess and will reopen on Monday, December 2.
Thanksgiving Day recess. The campus will be closed for Thanksgiving Day recess and will reopen on Monday, December 2.
Study week begins. Classes are scheduled, but major written exams are not given (with exception of mid-semester classes).
Instruction ends.
Final examinations begin. Final examinations are scheduled to be two hours long. For additional semester dates and deadlines, visit the Registrar’s Office website.
Semester ends.
Winter degree conferral date.
Grades due. Fall grades are due at the Office of the Registrar by 4 p.m.
Winter commencement. Graduate degree candidates.
Winter commencement. Undergraduate degree candidates.
Martin Luther King Jr. Day recess. The campus will be closed for the Martin Luther King Jr. Day recess and will reopen Tuesday, January 21.
Classes begin.
Last waitlist run.

Last day to drop and receive a 100% refund. Last day to add classes online. Modular, mid-semester, and educational outreach classes have different registration dates. Check your MyUNLV Student Center for specific deadlines for each class.
Last day to pay in person without late penalties.
Last day to pay online without late penalties.
Late payment fees apply.
Last day to pay in person and online prior to administrative drop for non-payment.
Administrative drop for non-payment.
Last day to add classes with department permission. Departments and colleges may have shorter time frames for late registration in classes.
Presidents’ Day recess. The campus will be closed for Presidents’ Day recess and will reopen on Tuesday, February 18.
Last day to completely withdraw from all classes and receive a 50% refund if your account is paid in full.

Last day for undergraduates to apply for May 2025 degree conferral. Late undergraduate applicants, please check with the Registrar’s Office. Graduate students should check with the Graduate College for deadlines.
Summer registration begins.
Spring break recess. Classes will not be held for spring break and will resume on Monday, March 24.

Last day to drop classes without a refund/change from credit to audit. No withdrawals or audits after this date. Modular, mid-semester, and educational outreach classes have different withdrawal dates. Check your myUNLV student center for specific deadlines for each class.
Fall registration begins.
Study week begins. Classes are scheduled, but major written exams are not given (with exception of mid-semester classes).
Instruction ends.
Final examinations begin. Final examinations are scheduled to be two hours long. For additional semester dates and deadlines, visit the Registrar’s Office website.
Spring commencement. Graduate degree candidates.
Semester ends.
Spring commencement. Undergraduate degree candidates.
Spring degree conferral date.
Grades due. Spring grades are due at the Office of the Registrar by 4:00 p.m.
Summer session I instruction begins.
Last day to drop summer session I classes without a W grade.
Memorial Day recess. The UNLV campus will be closed for the Memorial Day holiday and will reopen Tuesday, May 27.
Last day to drop summer session I classes with a W grade.
Instruction ends for summer session I.
Grades due for summer session I classes.
Summer session II instruction begins.
Last day to drop summer session II classes without a W grade.
Juneteenth recess. The UNLV campus will be closed for the Juneteenth holiday and will reopen Friday, June 20.
Last day to drop summer session II classes with a W grade.

Last day for undergraduates to apply for August 2025 degree conferral. Late undergraduate applicants, please check with the Registrar’s Office. Graduate students should check with the Graduate College for deadlines. Students whose degrees are conferred in August may participate in the following December’s commencement ceremony.
Independence Day recess. The UNLV campus will be closed for the Independence Day holiday and will reopen Monday, July 7.
Instruction ends for summer session II.
Grades due for summer session II classes.
Summer session III instruction begins.
Last day to drop summer session III classes without a W grade.
Study day.  No classes are in session.
Last day to drop summer session III classes with a W grade.
Study day. No classes are in session.
